thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 11 of 571
thread.title: Ashley R Taylor
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Ashley R Taylor

author: Ashley R Taylor
title: Ashley R Taylor
text: Because Public Storage seems like a large company, I did not expect to be treated in such a humble way as I was. It wasn't about how much money I spent, but it was about how much space I needed. He even offered that if I picked a place that was too big, I could move to a smaller one. This is the best experience I have ever had with a storage company and I know my things are super-secure!
